componentDescription: Organizes content into collapsible sections for efficient space management.

children.description: Specifies the React nodes that will be rendered inside the Accordion component, typically Accordion.Item components.

type.description: Determines the behavior of the Accordion, such as allowing single or multiple items to be open simultaneously.

defaultValue.description: Sets the initial open state of accordion items for an uncontrolled component. Can be a single string or an array of strings representing item values.

value.description: Controls the open state of accordion items for a controlled component. Can be a single string or an array of strings representing item values.

onValueChange.description: A callback function invoked when the open state of accordion items changes, providing the new value(s).

collapsible.description: If true, allows all accordion items to be collapsed, meaning no item has to be open.

shape.description: Defines the visual shape style of the Accordion component, affecting its corners or borders.

variant.description: Defines the visual variant style of the Accordion component, affecting its overall appearance.

views.description: Provides an object to apply custom styles to different sub-components of the Accordion.
